Question
========
A teacher wonders whether the mean grade for logic (variable logic) for students living away from home [Residential = 0] differs from the mean for students living at home [Residential = 1]. Perform the analysis and provide the p-value of the Levene's Test (with 3 decimal places).  

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-inferential_statistics-263-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-inferential_statistics-263-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 0.219
